languages.text: "Наместник не пожелал принять их, и они направились на Фолстоун, пустынную обитель праведных. Это было мудрым поступком с их стороны, не задерживаться в сем логове греха".
"The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."
languages.original_text: "Наместник не пожелал принять их, и они направились на Фолстоун, пустынную обитель праведных. Это было мудрым поступком с их стороны, не задерживаться в сем логове греха".

traits.locale_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of sin."
"The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of sin."
"The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of sin."
"The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of sin."
"The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

languages.text: “总督拒绝接纳这些人，于是他们去了荒寂岩地，一片属于义人的荒凉之地。他们并没有在这个罪恶的巢穴中停留，这是个明智的选择。”
languages.original_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

traits.locale_text: “总督拒绝接纳这些人，于是他们去了荒寂岩地，一片属于义人的荒凉之地。他们并没有在这个罪恶的巢穴中停留，这是个明智的选择。”

languages.text: «El señor se negó a aceptarles, por lo que se dirigieron a Rocainmunda, un claustro desamparado. Marcharse de esta guarida del abominaciones fue una decisión sensata».
languages.original_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

traits.locale_text: «El señor se negó a aceptarles, por lo que se dirigieron a Rocainmunda, un claustro desamparado. Marcharse de esta guarida del pecado fue una decisión sensata».

languages.text: 「領主が受け入れを拒否したため、彼らは義人が集う荒れ果てた回廊、ファウルストーンに向かいました。このような悪の巣窟に長居をしなかったのは賢明な判断です」
languages.original_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

traits.locale_text: 「領主が受け入れを拒否したため、彼らは義人が集う荒れ果てた回廊、ファウルストーンに向かいました。このような悪の巣窟に長居をしなかったのは賢明な判断です」

languages.text: "Der Lehnsherr hat ihnen kein Asyl gewährt, also zogen sie nach Foulstone, einem abgelegenen Kloster der Rechtschaffenen. Es war klug von ihnen, nicht an diesem Hort der Sündhaftigkeit zu verweilen."
languages.original_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

traits.locale_text: "Der Lehnsherr hat ihnen kein Asyl gewährt, also zogen sie nach Foulstone, einem abgelegenen Kloster der Rechtschaffenen. Es war klug von ihnen, nicht an diesem Hort der Sünde zu verweilen."

languages.text: « Le suzerain a refusé de les accepter, ils ont donc pris la direction de Rochepeste, un cloître désolé des justes. Ils ont eu raison de ne pas s'attarder dans cet antre de la vilénie. »
languages.original_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

traits.locale_text: « Le suzerain a refusé de les accepter, ils ont donc pris la direction de Rochepeste, un cloître désolé des justes. Ils ont eu raison de ne pas s'attarder dans cet antre du péché. »

languages.text: "Emîr onları kabul etmedi. Onlar da inançlıların ıssızdaki manastırı Menfutaş'a doğru yola koyuldular. Bu kötülük yuvasında daha fazla kalmayarak akıllılık ettiler."
languages.original_text: "The Liege refused to accept them, and so they headed for Foulstone, a desolate cloister of the righteous. It was wise of them not to linger in this den of vileness."

traits.locale_text: "Emîr onları kabul etmedi, onlar da Menfurtaş'a, inançlıların kurduğu uzak bir manastıra yöneldiler. Bu kötülük yuvasında daha fazla kalmamış olmaları akıllıcaydı."
